description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Mysteries and Miseries of America's Great Cities, embracing New York, Washington City, San Francisco, Salt Lake City, and New Orleans ... Illustrated with numerous engravings" Author: BUEL, James William. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10409.c.28." Page: 193 Place of Publishing: San Francisco Date of Publishing: 1883 Publisher: A. L. Bancroft & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000520208 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
